context: does the new drive mess with the old memory
response: No, the kids have told me everything was still the same.

context: Does it fit with a turtle beach?
response: Yes it does, perfectly. It's actually has the same wire settings for the Xbox controller. In the bottom of the chat pad there is a audio connect for your turtle beach/any other Xbox headset. So yes it does!

context: are the keys themselves illuminated? does the actual letters light up or is it just backlight around the keys? just making sure
response: The letters are backlit and you can toggle this on and off the keyboard is all black when off it looks better than the pic in my opinion

context: Does it have the west indie cricket team?
response: It has all the international teams. And you can download fan made rosters through the game so u have updated rosters for each team.

context: What age is this game best suitable for? I have a 5 and 4yr old and was wondering if this is a game they could play.
response: I bought this game for a 29 year old and he loved it!  I honestly don't know about children that young, nothing objectionable in it that I am aware of....requires a lot of manual dexterity.

context: does it have english audio (i.e Character phrases)
response: Unfortunately no, the entire game is in Japanese audio included. There are some sites that show you how to play the game as well as several Youtube videos done by people who own it.  If intrested this is the video that showed me how to set up a character.  http://youtu.be/1ElUYUWQKy0

context: can the left and right side buttons be used to go back and forward on online websites?
response: If you mean the Left and Right Small Buttons...then yes...you can use those for Forward and Back on sites.

context: I'm pretty abusive at times and sometimes break a joysick (Logitech and Saitek) in stressful combat or under duress. Is this stick durable?
response: ya it holds up real when im flying in war thunder.just take your time on your setting and you will be ok.

context: Does this mouse use a standard rechargeable battery type (AA, AAA, etc) or does it use a proprietary battery?
So this fits a Hori Tpu Case + a 3ds, and still fits?
response: It fits a 3ds xl and 6 game cartridges. If you have a clip-on case on your 3dsxl it will probably not fit.

context: Is $ 19.99 the price for the game itself? Or is the price only to hold a game for me? Either way- please tell me the total game price.Thanks.
response: Evidently as we approach Christmas the price goes up. It's $36 now, but still only $19.99 at Walmart. Weird.

context: I own this and love it, but is there a carrying case that will fit this snugly all together?
response: I haven't found one yet, I travel with it assembled in the original box as a cheap carry case.  I can recommend buying a small hardshell pistol case and then cutting the foam to fit.

context: can you play ps vita games on it????
response: No psp does not play psvita games. Psvita plays psp games

context: Is there a controller recommend for game play? If so what would be a good controller to use?
response: yes they are great to run the game with! You can use any type of PC wheel or xbox controller, anything with an axis, as the controllers can be programmed to any part of the game -hunter

context: Does this mouse use a standard rechargeable battery type (AA, AAA, etc) or does it use a proprietary battery?
response: It uses a built in battery, cant remove it, the base this mouse comes with also charges it, but battery should never really be an issue, the mouse also has an input hole, you can play while you charge.

context: Should I pay a little extra for G430 surround sound? Is actually worth the extra few bucks in terms of the technology difference?
response: Actually. I heard that since the surround sound is actually software so it actually makes it echo. You are better of getting the g230 just because i know you would be happy with the headset

context: Is $ 19.99 the price for the game itself? Or is the price only to hold a game for me? Either way- please tell me the total game price.Thanks.
response: The $19.99 is the current price of the PS3 game.  If Amazon drops the price before the release date, you will get a refund of the difference between the two prices.
